verses.roman:
sārvabhauma kahe,--'iṅhāra nāma sarvottama
bhāratī-sampradāya iṅho--hayena madhyama'

synonyms: sārvabhauma kahe—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya replied; iṅhāra—His; nāma—name; sarva-uttama—first-class; bhāratī-sampradāya—the community of the Bhāratī sannyāsīs; iṅho—He; hayena—becomes; madhyama—middle-class.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya said, " 'Śrī Kṛṣṇa' is a very good name, but He belongs to the Bhāratī community. Therefore He is a second-class sannyāsī."
